0.name: Family Realists
0.description: Highly family‑oriented, value stability and routine; enjoy shopping, avoid credit and investment, prefer debit or children’s cards and savings accounts

1.name: Experienced Rationalists
1.description: Men and women aged 45+, serious and independent; plan and save, value security and family, enjoy nature; avoid impulsive spending, invest for future

2.name: Seekers of the Easy Path
2.description: Young or mid‑aged individuals with undefined life goals; seek quick results and new experiences, willing to take risks; often take microloans or car loans and invest in education

3.name: Ambitious Careerists
3.description: Serious, ambitious people who plan everything, hold clear opinions and high career goals; financially literate, seek premium cards and investment products for long‑term planning

4.name: Keepers of the Past
4.description: Primarily pensioners with low incomes; prefer cash, minimal banking products and dislike online services; price sensitive and value traditional in‑person interactions
